text:
Yesterday, Gov. Roy Cooper & @ncdhhs Secretary Dr. Mandy Cohen visited a large-scale #vaccine site at the #UNC Friday Center to witness health care workers & North Carolinians 65+ receive the #COVID19 vaccine.

For the latest COVID-19 vaccine info, visit https://t.co/1sH7qPvENH. https://t.co/bi0fwDWbRk
